channel.title: Tech Talk Weekly
channel.description: A podcast that explores the latest in technology, programming, and innovation.
channel.author: Tech Talk Team

episode.title: The Future of AI in Everyday Life
episode.description: In this episode, we discuss how AI is transforming daily tasks and what the future holds for artificial intelligence.

episode.title: Understanding Blockchain Beyond Cryptocurrency
episode.description: We dive into blockchain technology, its applications outside of cryptocurrency, and its potential impact on industries.
